context.p: All computers provided by the classroom rental have hardwired internet. However, if you'd like to use your own computer, follow these steps to access Virginia Tech's wireless network temporarily.

step.cmd: On the device of your choice, connect to the "eduroam" wireless network.
Open a web browser and navigate to "vt.edu"
step.stepresult: You will be redirected to the VT Wireless landing page.

step.cmd: On the landing page you are redirected to, click "guest access" and enter "airclassroom" into the text box.
step.stepresult: You now have access to the eduroam wireless network for two hours.
step.steptroubleshooting: If your network connection drops because you have been using eduroam for more than two hours, simply repeat the above steps to renew your connection.
